Articles.Content:
FINALLY! I have a reason to build those ASW systems.

Every new capability brings a new counter.

Ooh what could these be?

I imagined down-facing jets to flip the enemy sub.

Then I laughed at the thought of a ship flying off uncontrollably because of down-facing engines and because the pilot didn't know how VTOLs work.

Ooh what could these be?

Some new VLS toys...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I'm considering making a giant flagship-type warship (space), with a massive battery of missiles, twin MACs, and a small hangar.

More info to come soon.

I'm considering making a giant flagship-type warship (space), with a massive battery of missiles, twin MACs, and a small hangar.

More info to come soon.

i can already say that's gonna be 1500+ parts good luck
i can already say that's gonna be 1500+ parts good luck
I doubt it. I barely went past that boundary when I built that supercarrier(Not the Xzibit class, 4x larger, Xzibit was a direct scale down.)
I've used ggators build a base kit to build a 1096 part space base
i can already say that's gonna be 1500+ parts good luck

Heh. Thanks, I'm probably going to plan out the details on paper first and then prototype in-game.

As for a fictional warship this might be similar to...

I'm thinking something like one the heavier UNSC ships from Halo. (MACs, lots of missiles, etc.)

good idea; when i planned out my Drek Thirty i got it to almost the exact specs i predicted on paper XD

Heh. Thanks, I'm probably going to plan out the details on paper first and then prototype in-game.

As for a fictional warship this might be similar to...

I'm thinking something like one the heavier UNSC ships from Halo. (MACs, lots of missiles, etc.)

I'm not sure that I want to get back into spaceship building, but if I do...

I just might try making some archer missiles pods.

Actually three, change of plan. 300 tonnes max, 5 craft. Also, around Duna. Also, anyone got a good avatar for me?

Edited November 27, 2014 by ejudedude13

I'm itching for a fight with my Starship, can I join a match? or should we start a new match by teams? reply A.S.A.P.

Here's my ship stats:

K.R.K.N. (Kraken Technologies)

Class: "Heavy Cruiser/Battlecruiser"

Name: "Hespera"

Model: 7

Cost: 297179.5

Part Count: 1022 parts in 5 stages

Total Mass 188.1 tons

Armament: 12 Total: 4 SRB's (Solid Rocket Boosters) "Burst" torpedoes, 6 "Hitter" Standard Liquid Fuel Engine Torpedoes and 2 "Shock" Experimental Torpedoes with experimental warhead payload (Equipped with 2 Small Supercharged I-Beam tipped shells each, which deploys before impact and makes a double action torpedo in 2 stages)

Armor and Constuction: Extremely Durable Hull and Strut reinforced (It is no longer susceptible to buckling and bending at high gravity). Double layered reative armor (up to three at the core module and at the Engines).

Powerplant and Propulsion: 8 hidden thermoelectric generators. 6 LV-T45 Liquid Fuel Engines, with basic fuel and monopropellant for RCS

Extra: Can Support up to 4 crew

So is this a GO? Will there be a match? I have to replace the engines on my ship and add external fuel tanks.

Meet my Submarine. (Not as good as Zekes though which can submerge)

K.R.K.N. (Kraken Technologies)

Class: "Submarine"

Name: "Hurricane"

Model: 1

Cost: 526948.5

Part Count: 1546 parts in 10 stages

Total Mass 243.1 tons

Armament: 8 R.A.P.I.E.R. Engine Missiles(Torpedoes) and 1 Frontal Shell.

Armor and Constuction: Extremely Durable Hull and Strut reinforced. Double layered reactive armor (up to three at the core module and at the Engines).

Powerplant and Propulsion: 11 thermoelectric generators. 1 Solar Panel. 6 R.A.P.I.E.R. Engines, with basic fuel.

Took a shot at it using my own missiles from the sub. It flips easily though. I need to add more stabilizers

Honestly I like these rules better. I am still in the process of redesigning my capital ships, and, as they are all very light tonnage-wise anyway, I probably will not come close to exceeding the limit, but whatever. Off to prepare vessels!

You do not have to fly your vessels to the location; just get Hyperedit and cheat them into orbit there...[shudders involuntarily] Having to actually send the ships there would be terrible.
